summary: Polkadot unites the world's innovators and changemakers, building and using the most transformative apps and blockchains. Access tools, guides, and resources to quickly start building custom chains, deploying smart contracts, and creating dApps.

source_repos.name: Polkadot SDK
source_repos.description: The core SDK for interacting with Polkadot.

source_repos.name: Polkadot Runtimes
source_repos.description: Runtimes for Polkadot and its system chains managed by the fellowship. Often referenced to see how the specific chain was configured.

source_repos.name: Polkadot Parachain Template
source_repos.description: Template for building a Polkadot parachain. It includes the necessary configurations and dependencies to get started quickly.

source_repos.name: Polkadot API Library
source_repos.description: Typescript library that is used often to interact with Polkadot.

optional_resources.title: Support: Get In Touch Directly
optional_resources.description: This page provides multiple options to get live technical support or ask questions.

optional_resources.title: Support: Ask the Community and Explore Resources
optional_resources.description: This page provides multiple options to connect with the Polkadot community and find additional information via resources like Stack Exchange or Reddit.
